module.p: bòidheach pretty is a simple adjective.

section.p:
Some examples –
àite bòidheach a lovely place –
older pedagogical examples –
Bha an latha brèagha blàth is thug an athair leis Iain agus Anna anns a’ chàr. Chaidh iad sìos taobh an locha is stad iad aig àite bòidheach gorm. [...]
The day was lovely and warm and their father took John and Ann in the car. They went down the side of the lake and they stopped at a beautiful green place. [...] td. 6–7
madainn bhòidheach a lovely morning –
examples from Gairm –
[...] ’Se madainn bhòidheach foghair a bh’ ann—tioram, le ceileir eòin, is beagan dealt air an fheur. Bha a[m] muir ’s na tighean ag éirigh á inntinn an latha. [...]
[...] It was a beautiful autumn morning – dry, with the chirping of birds, and a little dew on the grass. The sea and the houses were rising from the mind of the day [??]. [...] td. 169, le Iain Mac a’ Ghobhainn
